NTR good. The arts are generally better and the stories are generally less brain dead. It just has more flavor. For those sympathizing with the MCs, remember that MCs are usually model bad bfs. They fail to give their partners attention, and can't make sex enjoyable. There's really no excuses. If u don't ask a girl out, u can't blame someone for taking her. If u aren't good at sex, there are toys and stuff that can compensate(toys are better at sex than even the biggest of dicks). But, NTR also bad. Cause all the characters are still brain dead as hell. No matter how you spin it, NTRs generally contain rape and blackmail(both are extremely bad ofc), which makes inserting yourself as the douchebag questionable at best.
